snippet.title: Can you survive the terror in Shush (trailer)
snippet.description:
Shush" is an immersive survival game set in a world ravaged by environmental disasters. Join the ranks of the "Waste Warriors" employed by the recycling company "Sunny Smiles" and venture into the forest to gather trash using the revolutionary "Eco-Collector" machine. But as you delve deeper, mysterious occurrences and sabotage from the rival corporation "Black Harvest" reveal a dark secret lurking within the Eco-Collector. Navigate treacherous terrain, gather resources, and uncover the truth behind Sunny Smiles' sinister creation to survive and expose the monstrous reality hidden within the machine. Will you be a hero of truth or another victim of the Eco-Collector's insatiable hunger?

wishlist on Steam: 
https://store.steampowered.com/app/2901340/Shush/
